mapper.select: select news_id as id, title as title, case when LENGTH(subtitle)>150 then concat(left(subtitle,150),'...') else subtitle end as subtitle, publish_time as publishTime from tbl_news where publish_state=1 order by publish_time desc LIMIT #{startRow}, #{pageSize}
select news_id as id, title as title, subtitle as subtitle, content as content, publish_state as state, publish_time as publishTime from tbl_news where news_id=#{id}
select count(*) from tbl_news where publish_state=1

select news_id as id, title as title, case when LENGTH(subtitle)>150 then concat(left(subtitle,150),'...') else subtitle end as subtitle, publish_time as publishTime from tbl_news where publish_state=1 order by publish_time desc LIMIT 0,5
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_news( title, subtitle, content, publish_state, publish_time, create_time) value( #{title}, #{subtitle}, #{content}, #{state}, #{publishTime}, now() )
